title: Bitcoin’s correlation with Nasdaq drops to YTD low of -0.82
description:
Quick Take The performance of Bitcoin (BTC) within the current financial year has been remarkable, with an over 100% appreciation, well above the Nasdaq’s 32% and gold’s 8% increase. Notably, BTC’s behavior in the market has undergone a significant shift compared to the previous year. In 2022, Bitcoin was closely tethered to major indices, reflecting […]

title: JPMorgan’s digital token said to handle $1b in daily transactions
description: The bank also plans to expand support for fiat currencies to deal with JPM Coin other than the U.S. dollar and euro. JPMorgan’s blockchain-powered stablecoin JPM Coin, pegged to the U.S. dollar, has reached the $1 billion mark in processed…

title: “Ledger Recover”: A Bold Step Amidst Community Skepticism
description: Ledger has launched a new recovery service, “Ledger Recover,” which has been met with criticism and skepticism from the crypto community. The service encrypts and fragments users’ private keys, distributing them across three independent companies for enhanced security, but users have raised concerns about potential vulnerabilities and risks to their digital assets.
